title: Ticket #2798: disk space over 1TB not correctly reported in Windows
description: Disk capacity is incorrectly reported by Condor under Windows when the free space is greater than 1TB. An incorrect bitmask is used when computing free KB from the results returned by GetDiskFreeSpaceEx().
